name: All-in-One Board Games
description:

A top board games collection app with delicate picture, 10 classic board games included.

Tired of clicking so many apps for different board games?
As to the less and less phone memory, trouble in installing more apps?
Do you want to challenge yourself or just kill time in leisure time?
Then this app must be perfect to you!

Features:
1.10 board games in this app
2.Three levels: Easy, Med and Hard, meeting needs of all players.
3.Challenging computer or play with your friend on the same device, can also play against a friend via bluetooth on two devices.
4.In Game Center, free to play with friends or anyone online.
5.Enable to load game progress. Auto-save when exit or phone ring.
6.Undo function.
7.Excellent user interface and exciting sound effects.
8.iPhone and iPad are all supported.

1. 4 in a row
An enduring game, connect 4 pieces in a row to win.
2. Backgammon
This game involves luck factor.
3. Checkers
A game contributes to intelligence development
4. Chess
One of the greatest board game
5. Othello
A marvelous game
6. Ludo
A casual game, appropriate to all ages
7. Mancala
Easy to learn, difficult to master
8. Dots
The rule is simple, while not easy to win
9. TicTacToe
An easy game, kids and youth favor it very much
10. Gomoku
A pure strategy board game
